languages.english-overview:
Monstra is a fast and small content management system written in PHP! Monstra is the best CMS to manage a small-business website.
Monstra provides amazing api's for plugins, themes and core developers!
Monstra is an open-source project licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.

ul.li: Monstra provides amazing api's for plugins, themes and core developers!
You can create several adminstrators, editors, users for your site.
You can set individual keywords, description, title, search engines robots meta tag for each page!
